summary: Elite Apache helicopter pilots are tasked with destroying powerful armed drug cartels operating in South America.
cast: Nicolas Cage|Tommy Lee Jones|Sean Young|Bryan Kestner|Illana Diamant|Dale Dye|Mary Ellen Trainor|J.A. Preston|Peter Onorati|Charles Lanyer|Marshall R. Teague|Cylk Cozart|Charles Kahlenberg|Gregory Vahanian|Robert Lujan|Scott Williamson|Mickey Yablans|Bert Rhine|Peter Michaels|Richard Soto|Samuel Hernández|Kristin Wynn|Kristin Nicole Barnes|Phillip Troy Linger|Harrison Le Duke|Garth Le Master|Judson Spence|Oscar Granquist|William Medici|Angie Seegers
title: Pájaros de fuego
